item.description:
NEW LOCATIOIN !!!!

We are playing on Shell Point Beach in Onset. It isnt on my GPS so I found a good address on Google Maps - 59 West Central Avenue, Onset, MA.   When you get to the end of West Central Ave take a left and your first right down to the parking lot on the beach. That's where we will be playing.

Any questions call me - 508-479-7690

We'll start at 6 but come later if you can.

Bring a picnic.dinner and bug spray (just in case) - no open containers please... so if you choose to imbibe recreational libationis please conceal in a water bottle etc.

We'll meet rain or shine. If it does rain we'll go hang out at Marc Anthony's

see you there - R

If it rains we'll still meet and go out to Marc Anthony's so still show up...

wear sandals or sneakers... plenty of clam shells and small rocks on the beach... we have been raking tho... not bad but some footwear is good.
item.how_to_find_us: look for the volleyball net on the beach

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Volleyball on Shell Point Beach in ONSET
